scout_service_kit.description: Equipment provided by Scout Service for Highndry repair mission
scout_service_kit.source: Mr Anders Casarii, Scout Service office, Flammarion Highport

items.name: Circuit Panel Flight Cases (x3)
items.description: Three flight cases full of circuit panels and tools for swapping them out
items.purpose: Replace damaged control electronics on Highndry
items.weight: bulky but manageable for mountain climb

items.name: Portable Diagnostic/Software Download Unit
items.description: Same size as the other flight cases. Can diagnose systems and upload temporary control software
items.purpose: Verify repairs and install temporary control software
items.notes: Contains temporary control software package that expires in 3 months

items.name: Container of General Spares
items.description: One container of general spares and components
items.purpose: Replacement parts for various ship systems

expenses_credit.notes: Credited to accounts, how they spend it is their problem

seismic_charges.location: Aboard Highndry, strewn around in haphazard manner
seismic_charges.purpose: Emplace and detonate for volcano survey
seismic_charges.status: Intact - previous crew had little call to mess with them

planetary_survey_equipment.description: Scout ship's standard planetary survey sensors
planetary_survey_equipment.status: Functional - separate from flight systems, previous crew didn't tamper

survival_kits.description: Standard shipboard survival kits with life rafts

manifest.contents: Crates of supplies for scout base
Uniforms, boots, cases of wine for senior officers
manifest.notes: Crates NOT marked as bound for naval installation - discrete shipment

tenshers_wolf.name: Tensher's Wolf (Kimbley)
tenshers_wolf.notes: Abandoned pet. Food bowl marked 'Kimbley'. Can be befriended if fed and treated well. Otherwise hostile.

alderson.name: Alderson's Coastal Hunter
alderson.notes: 0.5m body with whip-like tail. Tenacious, difficult to kill with knife.

brakarr.name: Deep-Water Brakarr
brakarr.notes: Fish with armoured head, manipulative tentacles. Prefers deep cold water. Rarely in shallows.

walston_pet.name: Walston (burrower pet)
walston_pet.behaviour: Emits pleasing humming when petted, snuggles with people in distress
walston_pet.notes: Common household pet. No use as guard/working animal.

scout_service_offer.upfront: Cr1000 per traveller for incidental expenses
scout_service_offer.during_mission: All costs for life support, fuel covered
scout_service_offer.completion: Hotel accommodation + Cr1000 for expenses during week-long ship checkout
scout_service_offer.reward: One-year lease of Highndry on standard detached duty terms
scout_service_offer.additional: Scout Service pays (not much) for first-hand reports on starports visited

greener_offer.negotiable: Can be talked up slightly if approached respectfully
greener_offer.hard_limit: Won't pay more - already paid previous crew who ran off
greener_offer.alternative: Will wait for another ship if travellers are too greedy

local_costs.accommodation: Hostel with barracks-like rooms, basic meals, very cheap
